تم إرسال هذا البريد الإلكتروني من خارج مجموعة شلهوب. لا تنقر على الروابط أو تفتح المرفقات إلا إذا كنت تعرف المرسل وتعلم أنه آمن


Dear Valued Customer,

Please find attached your statement of account as of  08/10/2024.

Kindly arrange settlement of the overdue premiums, if any, at the earliest to ensure continuity of services. 

Payments for the Medical, Marine & Life Insurance should be made directly to the Insurance company either by cheque or via bank transfers.

Kindly ignore this email if you have already settled the due items recently.

‘Kindly note, we have changed the Bank Account to collect General policy premium from Invest Bank to ADCB and the same was communicated on 14th Jan 2022. If you haven’t received the details please revert’.

Best regards

Accounts Department
